function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential lack of public and professional awareness of germicidal UV technology and its efficacy.","Impact":"Increased risk of person-to-person transmission of airborne infections in occupied rooms due to lack of UV disinfection.","Mitigation":"Increase public and professional education and awareness about the effectiveness of germicidal UV and its safety.","Technologies":"Education and awareness campaigns, training and certification programs for UV technicians.","People":"Occupants of rooms, public health professionals, facility managers, UV technicians.","Owner":"Public health authorities, educational institutions, facility management companies."},{"Description":"Inadequate training and certification of UV technicians.","Impact":"Increased risk of improper application of UV technology, leading to ineffective disinfection and potential safety hazards.","Mitigation":"Implement training and certification programs for UV technicians to ensure proper and safe application of germicidal UV.","Technologies":"Training and certification programs, safety guidelines for UV exposure.","People":"UV technicians, facility managers, public health professionals.","Owner":"Educational institutions, public health authorities, facility management companies."},{"Description":"Lack of research on time-motion exposure to apply current UV exposure guidelines effectively.","Impact":"Inability to ensure optimal protection from airborne pathogens and potential risk of UV overexposure.","Mitigation":"Conduct research on time-motion exposure to inform and improve current UV exposure guidelines for optimal protection against airborne pathogens.","Technologies":"Research studies, data collection and analysis on UV exposure in various environments.","People":"Occupants of rooms, public health professionals, UV technicians, researchers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities, facility management companies."}]}
